name: Orgoth the Relentless
text: Once per turn, during your Main Phase: You can roll a six-sided die 3 times and this card gains ATK/DEF equal to the total x 100 (until the end of your opponent's turn), then, if 2 of the results were the same, apply the appropriate effect. If all 3 were the same, apply all of these effects. ?1 or 2: This card cannot be destroyed by battle or card effects, until the end of your opponent's turn. ?3 or 4: Draw 2 cards. ?5 or 6: This card can attack directly this turn.
